trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There were no other sightings in Buffalo on or around May 25th 2013
Summary: Observed glowing sphere at a distance, went behind building and then was further away/less bright upon viewing object coming past other side of building.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approx. 9:15pm, I was hanging out in Niagara Square with my girlfriend and observed a possible helicopter over the lake. Once noticing no FAA flashing lights, we continued to observe the glowing sphere go out of view behind a building. We waited approx. 30sec for the object to be viewable again, it was now either further away or far less bright. It was observable for an additional 20 or so seconds, flickered and then disappeared.
